content: swirly heart square pattern us terms -charts -written instructions -photo tutorial materials you can use any kind of yarn with matching hook size i used stylecraft special dk with hook 4mm and my square measures 12x12cm and with 3mm it measures 10x10cm please note this is an ad free pdf version of a free crochet pattern and photo tutorial that you can find on my linked blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns
